top.title: Eight skiers found dead after California avalanche
top.summary: Fifteen skiers went missing on Tuesday following a massive avalanche in California's Lake Tahoe region. One person remains missing but is presumed dead.

top.title: Do not give away Diego Garcia, Trump tells UK in fresh attack on Chagos deal
top.summary: The president's comments come just a day after the US gave its official backing to the UK's Chagos deal.

top.title: Hamas is reasserting control in Gaza despite its heavy losses fighting Israel
top.summary: Gazans say Hamas is again extending its control over security, tax revenue and government services.

top.title: Tech firms will have 48 hours to remove abusive images under new law
top.summary: The government is proposing that intimate image abuse should be treated more severely.

top.title: Zuckerberg defends Meta in landmark social media addiction trial
top.summary: The billionaire boss said he "always" regretted not making faster progress to identify users under 13.

top.title: Etsy sells second-hand fashion app Depop to eBay for $1.2bn
top.summary: The "pre-loved" fashion firm has been sold by Etsy just five years after it bought the firm.

title.#text: The RAM crunch could kill products and even entire companies, memory exec admits
Dyson turned its skinny PencilVac into a lightweight wet floor cleaner
Meta is reportedly planning to launch a smartwatch this year
